channel.title: Project Utopia - Updated 5/24/2010
channel.description:
[u][size=24pt]Project Utopia[/size][/u] Project Utopia is a server based off of Project Insanity because Project Insanity is just a beautiful server. I Am Sanity did a great job creating it to what it is toady. Firstly, every time the server is updated there will be a log that I will put at the bottom of this thread. Be sure to read them to keep up with what I am doing. I will also frequently add pictures to this thread. This thread and the server is a work in progress. Please bare with me.
[size=18pt]Logs[/size] [code]5/12/2010 - This thread was created. - Started editing the home - Starting editing the objects around. [/code] [code]5/13/2010 - Most objects in home now added. - Added 1 picture[/code] [code]5/24/2010 - Shop place was put in teleports - Rock Crabs is now the newbie training place - NPCs now edited into home - Skill teleports were edited - Some more small things[/code] [code]5/27/2010 - All dupes fixed (Major UPDATE!)[/code]
[img]http://img198.imageshack.us/img198/6910/75830818.png[/img]

item.title: Project Utopia - Updated 5/24/2010
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

jmood128:

Your should keep Jython, it is already added plus he could learn the language.

thats my view, i like using Jython, because of being able to dynamically update scripts.
However Jython is slower than Java.

I was only suggesting it because its basically just taking up space, and if he is not going to use it, he might as well loose it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Utopia - Updated 5/24/2010
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Goodluck, Riotscape is an amazing base.

Some advise, you can delete around 3 java files and a folder.

The task folder(and its contents) and the ScriptLoader( in the util folder) are unneeded because Sanity did not use jython, so it merely takes an extra thread for the scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Utopia - Updated 5/24/2010
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[size=24pt]Project Utopia[/size]
Project Utopia is a server based off of Project Insanity because Project Insanity is just a beautiful server. I Am Sanity did a great job creating it to what it is toady. Firstly, every time the server is updated there will be a log that I will put at the bottom of this thread. Be sure to read them to keep up with what I am doing. I will also frequently add pictures to this thread. This thread and the server is a work in progress. Please bare with me.

[size=18pt]Logs[/size]

[code]5/12/2010

  • This thread was created.
  • Started editing the home
  • Starting editing the objects around.

  • Most objects in home now added.
  • Added 1 picture[/code]

  • Shop place was put in teleports
  • Rock Crabs is now the newbie training place
